data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Almelo take a 1-0 lead thanks to Rai Vloet.
In the minute 26, Adrian Szoke for Almelo has been booked by Dennis Higler and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Goal! Silvester Van der Water extends Almelo's lead to 2-0 in Almelo with a header.
Rai Vloet instrumental with a fine assist.
The second-half is underway at Erve Asito.
Utrecht make their first substitution with Giovanni Troupee replacing Moussa Sylla.
In the minute 46, The away team have replaced Tommy St. Jago with Gyrano Kerk. This is the second substitution made today by John van den Brom.
The away team replace Mark Van der Maarel with Willem Janssen.
John van den Brom (Utrecht) is making a fourth substitution, with Othman Boussaid replacing Eljero Elia.
In the minute 61, Utrecht have been given a penalty...
Marco Rente is booked for the home team.
Goal! Utrecht now trail just 2-1 thanks to a penalty from Simon Gustafson.
In the minute 63, Goal! Almelo extend their lead to 3-1 through Rai Vloet.
Bart Ramselaar (Utrecht) gets a yellow card.
It's now 4-1 in Almelo as Rai Vloet scores for Almelo.
In the minute 78, Joris Overeem is replacing Bart Ramselaar for the away team.
Frank Wormuth is making the team's first substitution at Erve Asito with Sinan Bakis replacing Adrian Szoke.
Delano Burgzorg is replacing Luca de la Torre for Almelo at Erve Asito.
That's full-time at Erve Asito. The final score is 4-1.
Jeremy Cijntje is on a sub for Silvester Van der Water for Almelo.
